feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Workforce Management
feed.subtitle: SAP Workforce Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How can I get a PDF copy of SAP OCM toolkit ?
entry.content: Is SAP OCM toolkit public? Can anyone provide me a copy?

entry.title: How to generate the metadata file of a SFSF datacenter with SHA256?
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I'm trying to configure SINGLE SIGN ON (SSO) between succesfactors and workforce software, for that I need to download the metadata file. I do it through the structure of the following URL

https://<<Datacenter>>/idp/samlmetadata?company=<<CompanyId>>;

The problem is that it doesn't work for me because apparently SFSF made an update and this certificate must already be generated with a SHA 256 key. Does anyone know how I can do it? Should I add some parameter to the link structure?

entry.title: CPI-Filter-Xpath-Complex Query
entry.content:
Hi All,employee.png

I am working on a login where I need your help.

Requirement: I want to filter out Employee record whose Contract_Type=Vendor and want to pass another employee record whose Contract_Type = Permanent (Contract_Type is maintained as Property = Vendor)

Now the catch is 1st Employee has two Contract where we can use contract whose end date is not defined.

KINDLY HELP ME WITH FILTER LOGIC TO ACHIVE THE OUTPUT AS EMPLOYEE WITH CONTRACT_TYPE=PERMANENT.

<Employee>

<Contract>

<Position_ID>111</Position_ID>

<Contract_Type>ABCr</Contract_Type>

<Start_Date>2015-10-01</Start_Date>

<End_Date>2020-09-30</End_Date>

<Contract_Status>Closed</Contract_Status>

</Contract>

<Contract>

<Position_ID>112</Position_ID>

<Contract_Type>Vendor</Contract_Type>

<Start_Date>2021-01-04</Start_Date>

<Contract_Status>Closed</Contract_Status>

<Description>xyz</Description>

</Contract>

</Employee>

<Employee>

<Contract>

<Position_ID>115</Position_ID>

<Contract_Type>permanent</Contract_Type>

<Start_Date>2021-06-09</Start_Date>

<Contract_Status>Open</Contract_Status>

</Contract>

</Employee>



Regards,

Mohit

entry.title: Worker type in Manage Workforce
entry.content:
Hi,

In the workforce app, we see two worker types BUP003 (employee) and BBP005 (Contingent worker). Is there a way to create more worker types? We need a kind of a hybrid worker type.

  1. Internal employees
  2. Employee with a different payment agreement. They are not contingent workers.
  3. Contingent worker

We need this to differentiate pure internal employees from other types of employees.

Thanks for your answer.

BR,

Sumita

entry.title: error when edit in "manage workforce" app-SAP S/4 HANA Cloud
entry.content:
I want to edit worker in “manage workforce” app,

then click 'Convert'

Why entry source'SAP Fiori Manage Workforce app (W)' change to 'SAP Master Data Integration (M)'???

What's impact from this change???

Then click 'Edit',

Why Editing is restricted ????

entry.title: Holiday calendar in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

We do not have Success Factors Employee Central or other HR systems in scope. We are implementing professional services with intercompany processes. Is it possible to define a holiday calendar per company code so that the timesheet shows holidays of an employee?

Thanks for your answer.

Regards

entry.title: Table with Authorization Roles and Organizational Levels
entry.content:
Hello experts , 

i want to take from SE16N list with Roles and values for organizational Levels.

The result that i want to see in list i need to have columns : Name Role , Values from Organizational levels.

If i cant take this result in which table can i have roles and authorizations objects with Fields ?

Thanks a lot.

entry.title: How to Mass Import Worker Data for Concurrent Employment?
entry.content:
I need to create a lot of employee and some employes has Concurrent Employment, but I do not found a template that have the field "employement situation" to insert the option "Concurrent Employment" in app F6097 - Manage Wokforce. 

When I use the template "Templ_WorkAgreement_Semicolon" and try insert more than one cost center for the one employe the system show the error: "The dates for the Job Details entity shouldn't overlap"

Is it possible to mass import tWorker Data for Concurrent Employment?

entry.title: Replicate Basic Master Data for Workforce from External HR Systems (add address fields)
entry.content:
By using API (SAP_COM_0301 -> Replicate Basic Master Data for Workforce from External HR Systems ) it is possible to create Employee and Business partner.

It does not seem possible, however, to save Address details due to which address details not sync to Maintain Business Partner app.

How to overcome this limitation?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: SAP S4 HANA public cloud business user creation questions
entry.content:
What are the differences and limitations between the SCIM API and the Business User SOAP service for creating business users? Based on the documentation, both seem capable of creating business users, provided the worker ID is already present and passed. However, are there specific limitations to consider? Additionally, is there any indication that SAP plans to deprecate the SOAP-based service in favor of SCIM?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Can I use workforce in SAP DM without integration to SAP ERP?
entry.content:
In SAP Digital Manufacturing I want to make use of assigning people to shifts and use them in dispatching and monitoring without integration to ERP. Is this possible?

When I open Schedule Labor 2.0 I need to select a shift:

When i did this and I select a block i see no workforce:

But in the Manage Workforce app I need to create a scheduler configuration:

But it looks like that is only used in the integration to an ERP?

 

What can I do?

entry.title: "Manage Workforce" history is not displayed
entry.content:
In Manage Workforce app, for any given employee recently created, there seems to be an issue within "Show Change Log" option.

At first, there are a couple of existing lines when the area is reached. However, the only fields with value are "Changed by" and "Changed on". Fields such as "Field Name", "Old Value" and "New Value" appear empty.

Can this behavior be explained?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: SAP logon 800 - problems in closing PPS (ZFMWA and CJ20N)
entry.content:
We are using SAP Logon 800, and I’ll try to explain the full situation and where we’re unsure what exactly is going wrong.
Through ZFMWA – transfer of funds, I moved part of the funds from one project to another, with the intention of clearing out the first project so we could close it.
Then, in CJ20N – Project Builder, I proceeded to close the project, which the system allowed but said there is still some money on it - its not null.
The problem appears when I try to check the project again in ZFM_PREGLED_PROJEKT – project overview in english. Even though the project was closed, it still shows up in the results.(it should not because its closed)
 
And the next issue is the following:
When I check the project for the year 2025, this "already closed" project appears as cleared. However, when I view it across multiple years, this is not the case (it looks like the money is still on it).
So it seems that some data is not being passed forward properly, specifically the one I entered through the ZFMWA function.
Lastly, I noticed that when I check the target project (the one that received the transferred funds), the situation is the same — in 2025 everything looks fine, but over multiple years the transfer seems to disappear.
 
How can i properly close the project? (if we use KB15N it does the opposite - through years it shows no money in 2025 there is money)
Thank you for any help in advance!
